page.title: 05MILNER INSTITUTE
page.content: The Milner Institute is used as the Village Hall.The building itself was given to the village by Miss Milner. There is a working committee which has responsibility for running it.Each year a number of fund raising events have to be held to maintain the fabric .A pre-school playgroup meets four mornings a week.At the moment approx. 20 children attend.The Moore and Daresbury Woman's Institute meets every month.Over 60s club meets on Wed.afternoon.There is a Holy Communion Service on Thursday morning.Elections are held there.Moore Annual Show and a Autumn Fayre also held.The Parish Council also hold their meetings there.It is also the venue for such modern activities as aerobics and popmobility.An annual Folk Singing/Morris and Clog Dancing Festival held here.
